name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "The elevator's stopped! Over here! Take the stairs!"
My headache has mostly faded, so I no longer need Koujaku's support.
We leap down the stairs a flight at a time, alarms blaring in our ears.
I don't know how far there is to go. We'll just have to keep running until we make it.
My body is at its limit. If I stop for even a moment, I know I won't move again.
But at the same time, I feel like I could keep running forever.
For as long as it takes to escape.
The endless spiral of the staircase is making me dizzy. No one says a word. There's only the sound of our panting echoing off the walls.
Looking down, I see the staircase end in a hallway.
